item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】(Dolby Atmos) - Brian Eno - Foreverandevernomore - [MLP Lossless Dolby Atmos 16 ch - 7.1 ch TrueHD core 24bit 48kHz]
item.description:
Apologies if this is not kosher, but this is a bit of a cross post with another thread i made in the lossy albums section. Because i wanted to keep the 9 albums from the same artist consolidated in one thread and 8 of the 9 were lossy dolby atmos i included a lossless album in that thread. But i figured for better clarity to folks who maybe only have interest in true lossless and may not view the lossy forum i should also put this album available in the proper forum.

Brian Eno - Foreverandevernomore
Released: 14 October 2022
Genre: Electronic - Ambient - Alternative

Format / Quality: m4a / MLP Lossless Dolby Atmos 16 channel with 7.1 channel TrueHD core 24bit 48kHz – 3300 – 4000 kbps
1. "Who Gives a Thought" 3:59
2. "We Let It In" 3:28
3. "Icarus or Blériot" 4:23
4. "Garden of Stars" 4:19
5. "Inclusion" 4:55
6. "There Were Bells" 4:52
7. "Sherry" 3:25
8. "I'm Hardly Me" 3:50
9. "These Small Noises" 3:22
10. "Making Gardens Out of Silence" 8:21
